TopicTitle: FanWork Fridays: Art on the Hype Train

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n8xqjndC1I1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/422a2a815b589739e64c2ea0c015baba/tumblr_inline_n8xqokd9891rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Thanks, everyone, for taking the hype train to places we thought it couldn’t go. During the time on board, Nemecle made this lovely piece of art in honor of the new update.</p>
Wonderful art! Man, I miss the Hypetrain...
SoonTM, the hypetrain will start for 0.25, hopefully with GP2
I miss the hypetrain... like seriously, I'm the most nostalgic person ever
The hypetrain was a magical place........................until the next one!
Glad to see everyone was enjoying my HypeTrain driving skills! I'm bringing her back to the HypeTrain Station of Minimal Hype, and to the roundhouse until 0.25 is near.

Glad to see everyone was enjoying my HypeTrain driving skills! I'm bringing her back to the HypeTrain Station of Minimal Hype, and to the roundhouse until 0.25 is near.

Don't forget to clean the hypetubes! Gotta make sure its in top condition for next time.

Man, when we were all on the #HYPETRAIN I remember thinking to myself "this is so awesome and is probably going to end horrifically!"

...Yet here we all are safe and sound! Until next time!
But... you guys seem to have forgotten... THE TRAIN NEVER STOPS!
True - but nevertheless, lots of people jump off, sometimes for months on end, and the train goes a lot slower and becomes a lot quieter as a result!
the hypetrain isn't just a thing or a transportation device it...it... it's an idea a way of life you don't just ride the hypetrain. you LIVE the hypetrain
But but our legs aren't long enough to reach both hype rails!

True - but nevertheless, lots of people jump off, sometimes for months on end, and the train goes a lot slower and becomes a lot quieter as a result!

Eh, yeah you have me agreed on that one. But it never truly stops...

the hypetrain isn't just a thing or a transportation device it...it... it's an idea a way of life you don't just ride the hypetrain. you LIVE the hypetrain

And YOU sir don't get off xD. Hypetrain lyfe b3st lyfe?
